alert.note: Alert for Greater Bristol Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued June 09 at 10:01AM AKDT until June 09 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING FOR KATMAI NATIONAL PARK AND PRESERVE... * Timing...Thunderstorm activity is expected to begin around 2 PM and continue until 10 PM. * Location...Katmai National Park and Preserve * Lightning Activity Level...4 (Scattered Wet Thunderstorms) * Winds...Variable 10 mph. Variable gusts to 25 mph near thunderstorms. * Relative Humidity...As low as 35 percent in valley areas. * Temperatures...60 to 70 degrees. 50s over higher, snow free elevations. * Impacts...Ample lightning could lead to numerous new fire starts.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are imminent or occurring now, or will shortly. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them to the public.
